subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The heights of dominance the Nationals’ Max Scherzer reached can hardly be overstated. Using his full array of overpowering pitches, he humbled the Mets on Saturday.
snippet: The heights of dominance the Nationals’ Max Scherzer reached can hardly be overstated. Using his full array of overpowering pitches, he humbled the Mets on Saturday.
